snippet.title: Earth Romancer Gameplay Teaser #1
snippet.description:
Planned for a Steam and console release, Earth Romancer is a fast-paced, nuanced fighting game set to marry traditional mechanics with platforming mayhem!

Stay tuned for more gameplay trailers, developer logs and more!

Find us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/EarthRomancer
